goal.en: "The objective of this course is to introduce the fundamental knowledge of the hydrogeology to students. 15 topics include in this course are designed to focused on concepts, methods, and applications of hydrogeology in the fields of geoenvironment, georesources, and geohazards."
goal.ch: 本課程主要目標是讓修課學生能學得基本的水文地質知識，本課程設計的十五個主題將涵蓋地質環境、地質資源與地質災害問題中，與水文地質學的相關的概念、方法及應用。

content.en:
"1. What is hydrogeology and the applications?
2. Hydrological cycle
3. Characteristic and classification of an aquifer
4. Flow and transport in aquifers
5. Presentations of geoenvironment, georesources, and geohazards cases
6. Groundwater flow: Darcy‘s law and hydraulic conductivity
7. Flow equations and boundary conditions(1)
8. Flow equations and boundary conditions(2)
9. Aquifer tests
10. Aquifer tracer tests
11. Soil/Rock and hydrogeological parameters (mainly the porosity and permeability)
12. Key factors for hydrogeological parameters
13. Spatial distribution and scale effect of hydrogeological parameters
14. Geological and hydrogeological conceptual models
15. Case study: water resources, CO2 sequestration, and nuclear wast"
content.ch:
"1. 水文地質學的內涵與應用
2. 水文循環
3. 含水層特性與分類
4. 含水層水流與傳輸現象
5. 水文地質學相關環境、資源與災害議題研討
6. 地下水的流動：Darcy 定律與水力傳導係數
7. 地下水流方程式與邊界條件(一)：直角座標系統
8..地下水流方程式與邊界條件(二)：圓柱座標系統
9. 含水層水力試驗
10. 含水層傳輸示蹤劑試驗
11.土壤/岩石與水文地質參數(主要介紹孔隙率及滲透率)
12. 影響土壤/岩石水文地質參數的因素
13 水文地質參數空間分布/尺度效應
14.地質概念模式與水文地質概念模式
15. 案例探討：水資源開發、二氧化碳封存、核廢料處置"

textbook.en: "Classroom handouts and papers Domenico, P.A., Schwartz, F.W., 1998, Physical and Chemical Hydrogeology, 2nd edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., New York."
textbook.ch: "其他課堂講義及文獻 Domenico, P.A., Schwartz, F.W., 1998, Physical and Chemical Hydrogeology, 2nd edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., New York."
